long_description: Steadfast in all of your winter adventures, the women's Arc'teryx Stingray snow pants feature Gore-Tex(R) soft-shell fabric that provides a supple, warm solution to snow and moisture. Gore-Tex Soft Shell 3L low-loft is a rugged nylon woven face fabric bonded to a soft low-loft polyester liner; offers waterproof, breathable protection from the elements. Low-loft liner enhances warmth without sacrificing breathability. Flat waistband with zipper fly and dual, low-profile adjusters let you dial in the fit; includes large loops if you prefer your own belt. Waistband lining of CoreLine(TM) high gauge synthetic knit traps warmth and is ultra-smooth for easy layering. Instep patches along hems are made of hardy Keprotec(R) for extreme abrasion resistance. Stretch boot gaiters prevent snow from getting down into your boots, even in deep snow. Includes handwarmer pockets with WaterTight(TM) zippers and molded zipper garages. Side vents with 2-way WaterTight zippers enhance airflow when needed.
short_description: Steadfast in all of your winter adventures, the women's Arc'teryx Stingray snow pants feature Gore-Tex(R) soft-shell fabric that provides a supple, warm solution to snow and moisture.
